description.en: Ethereum -3X leveraged ETF is an exchange traded product which tracks the daily return of Ethereum by leverage ratio -3. If the underlying return is -1%, then the -3X ETF will increase by 3%. This product is tail-made for the investors dislike the margin call mechanism and prevails in a market condition with strong momentum.
